content.description: Puer agricolas, quos in agris vidit, vocabat.
content.question: In the sentence, quos in agris vidit is translated

choices.label: by whom he was seen in the fields
in whose fields he was seen
whom he saw in the fields
who saw him in the fields

content.answer: whom he saw in the fields

skill.text: 1.B: Describe how grammar contributes to the meaning and function of Latin words and phrases in context.
